patthana14.22:1.1: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana14.22:2.1: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.22:3.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca.)
